programme.title: NHL Hockey Florida Panthers at Tampa Bay Lightning
programme.sub-title: Florida Panthers at Tampa Bay Lightning
programme.desc: The Panthers visit the Lightning for Game 5 of their East quarterfinal. Tampa Bay scored twice in 11 seconds during the second period of Game 4, but Florida used its own 11-second outburst to leap ahead and secure a 4-2 win, and a 3-1 series lead.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Florida Panthers at Toronto Maple Leafs
programme.sub-title: Florida Panthers at Toronto Maple Leafs
programme.desc: The Maple Leafs try to slay their ghosts in Game 7 of the East semifinal with the Panthers. Toronto stayed alive with a resolute 2-0 Game 6 victory in Florida. Auston Matthews (TOR) broke a 0-0 tie with a third-period goal, his first of the series.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Florida Panthers at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.desc: The Hurricanes head back home to host the Panthers for Game 5 of the Eastern Conference finals. Frederik Andersen made 20 stops for his second shutout of the postseason as Carolina staved off elimination with a 3-0 victory over Florida in Game 4.

programme.title: 2025 Stanley Cup Final
programme.desc: The Panthers aim to claim their second straight Stanley Cup in Game 6 against the Oilers. Florida made an early 2-0 lead in Game 5 hold up for an eventual 5-2 victory over Edmonton. Brad Marchand scored the first and third goals for the Panthers.
